package.name: greek-letters
package.author: Billy McCann
package.description: A simple way to type Greek upper and lowercase letters
package.title: Greek Letters: Upper and Lower

manifest.author: Billy McCann
manifest.description: A simple way to type Greek upper and lowercase letters
manifest.name: greek-letters
manifest.title: Greek Letters: Upper and Lower

packageRepo.readme:
# Greek Letters from Espanso

This plugin allows Espanso users to expand keystrokes such as <kbd>:ga</kbd> into the
Greek letter alpha α.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Greek Letters

matches:
  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER ALPHA
  - trigger: ":gA"
    replace: "Α"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER ALPHA
  - trigger: ":ga"
    replace: "α"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER BETA
  - trigger: ":gB"
    replace: "Β"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER BETA
  - trigger: ":gb"
    replace: "β"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER DELTA
  - trigger: ":gD"
    replace: "Δ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER DELTA
  - trigger: ":gd"
    replace: "δ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER EPSILON
  - trigger: ":gE"
    replace: "Ε"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER EPSILON
  - trigger: ":ge"
    replace: "ε"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER PHI
  - trigger: ":gF"
    replace: "Φ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER PHI
  - trigger: ":gf"
    replace: "φ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER GAMMA
  - trigger: ":gG"
    replace: "Γ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER GAMMA
  - trigger: ":gg"
    replace: "γ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER ETA
  - trigger: ":gH"
    replace: "Η"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER ETA
  - trigger: ":gh"
    replace: "η"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER IOTA
  - trigger: ":gI"
    replace: "Ι"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER IOTA
  - trigger: ":gi"
    replace: "ι"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER THETA
  - trigger: ":gJ"
    replace: "Θ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER THETA
  - trigger: ":gj"
    replace: "θ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER KAPPA
  - trigger: ":gK"
    replace: "Κ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER KAPPA
  - trigger: ":gk"
    replace: "κ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER LAMDA
  - trigger: ":gL"
    replace: "Λ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER LAMDA
  - trigger: ":gl"
    replace: "λ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER MU
  - trigger: ":gM"
    replace: "Μ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER MU
  - trigger: ":gm"
    replace: "μ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER NU
  - trigger: ":gN"
    replace: "Ν"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER NU
  - trigger: ":gn"
    replace: "ν"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER OMICRON
  - trigger: ":gO"
    replace: "Ο"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER OMICRON
  - trigger: ":go"
    replace: "ο"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER PI
  - trigger: ":gP"
    replace: "Π"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER PI
  - trigger: ":gp"
    replace: "π"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER CHI
  - trigger: ":gQ"
    replace: "Χ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER CHI
  - trigger: ":gq"
    replace: "χ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER RHO
  - trigger: ":gR"
    replace: "Ρ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER RHO
  - trigger: ":gr"
    replace: "ρ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER SIGMA
  - trigger: ":gS"
    replace: "Σ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER SIGMA
  - trigger: ":gs"
    replace: "σ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER TAU
  - trigger: ":gT"
    replace: "Τ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER TAU
  - trigger: ":gt"
    replace: "τ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER UPSILON
  - trigger: ":gU"
    replace: "Υ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER UPSILON
  - trigger: ":gu"
    replace: "υ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER OMEGA
  - trigger: ":gW"
    replace: "Ω"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER OMEGA
  - trigger: ":gw"
    replace: "ω"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER XI
  - trigger: ":gX"
    replace: "Ξ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER XI
  - trigger: ":gx"
    replace: "ξ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER PSI
  - trigger: ":gY"
    replace: "Ψ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER PSI
  - trigger: ":gy"
    replace: "ψ"

  # GREEK CAPITAL LETTER ZETA
  - trigger: ":gZ"
    replace: "Ζ"

  # GREEK SMALL LETTER ZETA
  - trigger: ":gz"
    replace: "ζ"
